6
7#ifndef COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TRANSLATORMETALDIRECT_PROGRAMPRELUDE_H_
8#define COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TRANSLATORMETALDIRECT_PROGRAMPRELUDE_H_
9
10#include <unordered_set>
11
12#include "common/angleutils.h"
13
14namespace sh
15{
16
17class TInfoSinkBase;
18class TIntermBlock;
19
20enum class MetalShaderType
21{
22 None,
23 Vertex,
24 Fragment,
25 Compute, // Unused currently
26 Count,
27};
28
29struct ProgramPreludeConfig
30{
31public:
32 ProgramPreludeConfig() {}
33 explicit ProgramPreludeConfig(MetalShaderType shaderType)
34 : shaderType(shaderType)
35 {}
36 bool hasStructEq = false;
37 MetalShaderType shaderType = MetalShaderType::None;
38};
39
40// This emits fixed helper Metal code directly without adding code to the AST. This walks the AST to
41// figure out the required what prelude MSL code is needed for various things in the AST. You can
42// think of this as effectively inlining various portions of a helper library into the emitted
43// Metal program.
44ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool EmitProgramPrelude(TIntermBlock &root,
45 TInfoSinkBase &out,
46 const ProgramPreludeConfig &ppc);
47
48} // namespace sh
49
50#endif // COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TRANSLATORMETALDIRECT_PROGRAMPRELUDE_H_
51
